columns.f_id: The unique identifier for each file entry.
columns.artist_name: The name of the artist associated with the file.
columns.file_size: The size of the file in megabytes.
columns.duration: The playback length of the file in minutes and seconds.
columns.formats: The file format type such as mp3 or mp4.

files.table_description: The table stores metadata about music files including size and duration.

columns.g_name: The unique name of the music genre.
columns.rating: The popularity rating of the genre on a scale.
columns.most_popular_in: The geographic regions where the genre is most popular.

genre.table_description: The table categorizes music genres with associated ratings and popularity.

columns.artist_name: The unique name of the artist.
columns.country: The country where the artist is based.
columns.preferred_genre: The music genre the artist prefers.

artist.table_description: The table profiles artists with their name, country, gender, and preferred genre.

columns.song_name: The unique name of each song in the database.
columns.artist_name: The name of the artist who performed the song.
columns.country: The country where the song or artist is based.
columns.f_id: The unique identifier for the associated file of the song.
columns.genre_is: The genre category to which the song belongs.
columns.rating: The rating score assigned to the song.
columns.languages: The language in which the song is sung.
columns.releasedate: The date when the song was officially released.
columns.resolution: The audio resolution quality of the song in kilobits.

song.table_description: The table stores detailed information about songs with attributes like artist and genre.
